Home.About: @:Common.AppName provides different tool modules to help with Plex Server management.
Home.Name: Home
Home.Title: Welcome to @:Common.AppName
Home.LangUpdateMsg: {0} Language has been updated on the translation site
Home.LangUpdateMsg2: Please go to Language option and select '{0}'

Language.Description: @:Common.Language.Name allows you to change language of the app
Language.Name: Language
Language.LangMissing: My language is missing from above
Language.LangMissing1: if your language is missing in above list, it means that unfortunately nobody has translated it, yet.
Language.LangMissing2: If so, we urge you to not only help us, but also your fellow countryfolk using Plex.
Language.LangMissing3: Please visit the link below to sign up as a translator!
Language.LangMissing4: Doing so, will also list you in the about page ;)
Language.LangSpelling1: If so, we urge you to join the translation site as well.
Language.LangProcent: What does the number after the language mean?
Language.LangProcent1: The number indicates how much of your language that is translated
Language.LangProcent2: If not on 100%, then we need your help
Language.LangForce1: It updates your translations with the newest version available

Login.UsernamePrompt: Enter your plex.tv Username or Email
Login.twoFAPrompt: If using 2FA, enter your code here, else leave as blank (optional)

PlexTV.Name: plex.tv
PlexTV.Description: @:Modules.PlexTV.Name module allows you get details about users you are sharing with
PlexTV.TT-User: Here you select the user to get more info about

PMS.Name: Plex Media Server
PMS.Description: @:Modules.PMS.Name module allows you to manage your server
PMS.ErrorNoServerSelectedMsg: You need to select a server on the top of the screen

Settings.Description: Here you can define the settings for the selected server
Settings.Notice: Note: When changing a server setting you might need to restart the server afterwards
Settings.TTSelectSettingsSelection: Here you select the group the setting you want to alter is in
Settings.varning: Change at your own risk. Any change can lead to malfunction of your plex server

Custom.Title: Custom levels
Custom.Description: A custom level allows you to create your own export levels
Custom.DeleteLevel: Do you want to delete selected level?
Custom.NewLevelTitle: Enter name for the new level
Custom.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {0}

ET.Description: @:Modules.ET.Name allows you to export detail information about the media in your libraries
ET.Name: ExportTools
ET.ErrorNoServerSelectedMsg: You need to select a server to extract from

Settings.Description: Here you can define the settings for @:Modules.ET.Name
Settings.ArraySep: Delimiter for multiple info in same field
Settings.ColumnSep: Delimiter between columns in CSV file (Use 9 for TAB)
Settings.TimeOut: Timeout when requesting info from PMS in sec (Global setting)
Settings.ExportToExcel: Export to xlsx as well as csv
Settings.NotAvailIndicator: What to use if a field can't be found

ET.LevelInfo: Export level determines which data are going to be exported.
ET.TT-ETType: Here you select the type of library you want to export
ET.TT-ETLibrary: Here you select library you want to export
ET.TT-ETLevel: Here you select the values you want to export

Status.Processing-Chunk-Detailed:
Processing chunk {current} of {total}.
items to export: {urlStr}

ET.ErrorNoOutDirMsg: You need to define an output directory in the settings page first
ET.ErrorBadSep: Column separator can only be one character

About.Name: About us and credits
About.Devdane22: Tommy (aka dane22), a Plex community member (ukdtom on GitHub)
About.DevCPSO: Casper (aka CPSO), a Plex community member (CPSO on GitHub)
About.TranslationBetaTestersText: A huge thanks goes out to all the people who helped in translating and testing @:Common.AppName
About.PlexPoCredits: And many thanks to the authors/developers and staff at Plex. We are eternally grateful for your dedication, talent and hard work! And to our friends at POEditor.com, who provide a free translation site because we are an Open-Source project.
About.Wikitrumpy81: Andy (aka trumpy81), a Plex community member (trumpy81 on GitHub)

GlobalSettings.Title: Global Settings
GlobalSettings.Description: Here you configure the global settings, that influence all modules
GlobalSettings.TimeOut: Timeout when requesting info from PMS in sec
GlobalSettings.LogLevelFile: What file log level to use (Change only if asked by the devs)
GlobalSettings.LogLevelConsole: Console log level (Only used when developing)
GlobalSettings.RestartNeeded: When changing this setting, a restart is needed
GlobalSettings.FactoryResetWarning: Factory Reset will reset this app towards how it was when first installed
